languages.text: Осознав, что порядки в Просторе изменились, агенты Касбаллики умерили аппетиты и ограничивали торговлю лишь предметами умеренной опасности. Самые опасные трофеи они тайно сдавали Инквизиции вместе с информацией об их подозрительных поставщиках. Информация о данном теневом союзе охранялась особенно тщательно.

Realising that things were changing in the Expanse, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to goods of moderate risk. They secretly turned the most dangerous trophies over to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. Information about this shadowy alliance was tightly controlled.
languages.original_text: Осознав, что порядки в Просторе изменились, агенты Касбаллики умерили аппетиты и ограничивали торговлю лишь предметами умеренной опасности. Самые опасные трофеи они тайно сдавали Инквизиции вместе с информацией об их подозрительных поставщиках. Информация о данном теневом союзе охранялась особенно тщательно.

traits.locale_text: Realising that way of doing things in the Expanse shifted, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to the goods of moderate risk. The most dangerous trophies they secretly turned in to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. Information about this shadowy alliance was under special protection.

Realising that way of doing things in the Expanse shifted, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to the goods of moderate risk. The most dangerous trophies they secretly turned in to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. Information about this shadowy alliance was under special protection.

Realising that things were changing in the Expanse, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to goods of moderate risk. They secretly turned the most dangerous trophies in to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. This shadowy alliance was kept highly classified.

Realising that things were changing in the Expanse, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to goods of moderate risk. They secretly turned the most dangerous trophies in to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. This shadowy alliance was kept highly classified.

Realising that things were changing in the Expanse, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to goods of moderate risk. They secretly turned the most dangerous trophies over to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. Information about this shadowy alliance was tightly controlled.

Realising that things were changing in the Expanse, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to goods of moderate risk. They secretly turned the most dangerous trophies over to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. Information about this shadowy alliance was tightly controlled.

languages.text: 卡斯巴利卡的代理人意识到，科罗努斯扩区中的情况正在发生变化。他们控制住了自己的胃口，只交易那些风险适中的货物。他们把最危险的战利品上交给了审判庭，并提供了关于可疑供应商的信息。这个神秘的联盟的一切情报都被列为高度机密，鲜有人知。
languages.original_text: Realising that things were changing in the Expanse, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to goods of moderate risk. They secretly turned the most dangerous trophies over to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. Information about this shadowy alliance was tightly controlled.

traits.locale_text: 卡斯巴利卡的代理人意识到，科罗努斯扩区中的情况正在发生变化。他们控制住了自己的胃口，只交易那些风险适中的货物。他们把最危险的战利品上交给了审判庭，并提供了关于可疑供应商的信息。这个神秘的联盟被列为高度机密，鲜有人知。

languages.text: Als die Agenten der Kasballica erkannten, dass sich die Dinge in der Ausdehnung änderten, zügelten sie ihren Appetit und beschränkten sich auf den Handel mit Waren von mäßigem Risikograd. Heimlich übergaben sie die gefährlichsten Trophäen an die Inquisition, zusammen mit Informationen über die zwielichtigen Lieferanten, von denen sie sie erhalten hatten. Informationen über diese Schattenallianz waren streng geheim.
languages.original_text: Realising that things were changing in the Expanse, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to goods of moderate risk. They secretly turned the most dangerous trophies over to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. Information about this shadowy alliance was tightly controlled.

traits.locale_text: Als die Agenten der Kasballica erkannten, dass sich die Dinge in der Ausdehnung änderten, zügelten sie ihren Appetit und beschränkten sich auf den Handel mit Waren von mäßigem Risikograd. Heimlich übergaben sie die gefährlichsten Trophäen an die Inquisition, zusammen mit Informationen über die zwielichtigen Lieferanten, von denen sie sie erhalten hatten. Diese Schattenallianz war natürlich streng geheim.

languages.text: Réalisant que les choses changeaient dans les Étendues, les agents de la Kasballica revirent leurs ambitions à la baisse et limitèrent leur commerce à des marchandises aux risques modérés. Ils remirent subrepticement les trophées les plus dangereux à l'Inquisition, ainsi que des informations sur leurs fournisseurs suspects. Cette sombre alliance fut maintenue dans le plus grand secret.
languages.original_text: Realising that things were changing in the Expanse, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to goods of moderate risk. They secretly turned the most dangerous trophies over to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. Information about this shadowy alliance was tightly controlled.

traits.locale_text: Réalisant que les choses changeaient dans les Étendues, les agents de la Kasballica revirent leurs ambitions à la baisse et limitèrent leur commerce à des marchandises aux risques modérés. Ils remirent subrepticement les trophées les plus dangereux à l'Inquisition, ainsi que des informations sur leurs fournisseurs suspects. Cette sombre alliance fut maintenue dans le plus grand secret.

languages.text: Al comprender el cambio que estaba teniendo lugar en la Extensión, los agentes de la Kasballica limitaron sus ambiciones y pasaron a solo comerciar productos de riesgo moderado. En secreto, entregaron sus trofeos más peligrosos a la Inquisición junto con información sobre sus sospechosos proveedores. La información sobre esta alianza velada se mantuvo estrictamente confidencial.
languages.original_text: Realising that things were changing in the Expanse, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to goods of moderate risk. They secretly turned the most dangerous trophies over to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. Information about this shadowy alliance was tightly controlled.

traits.locale_text: Al comprender el cambio que estaba teniendo lugar en la Extensión, los agentes de la Kasballica limitaron sus ambiciones y pasaron a solo comerciar productos de riesgo moderado. En secreto, entregaron sus trofeos más peligrosos a la Inquisición junto con información sobre sus sospechosos proveedores. Esta alianza velada se mantuvo estrictamente confidencial.

languages.text: エクスパンスで状況が変わりつつあることを知ったカスバリカの諜報員はその欲望を抑え、そこそこ危険な商品の取引を制限した。彼らは最も危険な戦利品を異端審問庁に密かに提出し、不審な仕入先の情報とともに提出した。この影の同盟に関する情報は極秘に保たれた。
languages.original_text: Realising that things were changing in the Expanse, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to goods of moderate risk. They secretly turned the most dangerous trophies over to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. Information about this shadowy alliance was tightly controlled.

traits.locale_text: エクスパンスで状況が変わりつつあることを知ったカスバリカの諜報員はその欲望を抑え、そこそこ危険な商品の取引を制限した。彼らは最も危険な戦利品を異端審問庁に密かに提出し、不審な仕入先の情報とともに提出した。この影の同盟に関する情報は極秘に保たれた。

languages.text: Enginlik'te bir şeylerin değişmekte olduğunu fark eden Kasballica mensupların, iştahlarını dizginleyip faaliyetlerini orta düzeyde risk taşıyan ürünlerle sınırlandırdı. Ellerindeki en tehlikeli yadigârları, onları elde etmelerini sağlayan şüpheli tedarikçilerin bilgileriyle beraber, gizlice Engizisyon'a teslim ettiler. Bu gizli ittifaka dair detaylar ise sıkı bir şekilde kontrol altında tutuldu.
languages.original_text: Realising that things were changing in the Expanse, Kasballica agents limited their appetites and restricted their trade to goods of moderate risk. They secretly turned the most dangerous trophies over to the Inquisition, alongside information about their suspicious suppliers. Information about this shadowy alliance was tightly controlled.

traits.locale_text: Enginlik'te bir şeylerin değişmekte olduğunu fark eden Kasballica üyeleri, iştahlarını dizginlediler ve faaliyetlerini, orta düzeyde risk taşıyan ürünlerle sınırladılar. Ellerindeki en tehlikeli yadigârları, onları elde etmelerini sağlayan şüpheli tedarikçilerin bilgileriyle beraber, gizlice Engizisyon'a teslim ettiler. Bu gizli ittifaka dair detaylar sıkı bir şekilde kontrol altında tutuldu.
